name: Coinnekt+
description: Coinnekt+ (CNKT+) is an ERC-20 token on Polygon designed to power a global, decentralized entrepreneurship ecosystem. Its purpose is to connect entrepreneurial education, real-world project execution, and access to capital inside a single tokenized platform. Users learn, validate ideas, launch products, and earn rewards directly in CNKT+. The token provides utility through staking, governance, merchant integrations, cashback incentives, and participation in on-chain incubation processes. By combining training, incentives, and decentralized funding, Coinnekt+ transforms entrepreneurship into an accessible, gamified, and reward-driven experience for founders worldwide.
